column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: inventory. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix inv: <http://example.com/inventory#> .inv:InventoryItem rdf:type rdfs:Class ;                  rdfs:label "Inventory Item"@en ;                  rdfs:comment "A class representing items in the inventory." .inv:itemID rdf:type rdf:Property ;           rdfs:label "item ID"@en ;           rdfs:comment "The unique identifier of an item in the inventory." ;           rdfs:domain inv:InventoryItem ;           rdfs:range xsd:string .inv:itemName rdf:type rdf:Property ;             rdfs:label "item Name"@en ;             rdfs:comment "The name of an item in the inventory." ;             rdfs:domain inv:InventoryItem ;             rdfs:range xsd:string .inv:itemQuantity rdf:type rdf:Property ;                 rdfs:label "item Quantity"@en ;                 rdfs:comment "The quantity of an item in the inventory." ;                 rdfs:domain inv:InventoryItem ;                 rdfs:range xsd:integer .inv:Warehouse rdf:type rdfs:Class ;              rdfs:label "Warehouse"@en ;              rdfs:comment "The warehouse where inventory items are stored." .inv:contains rdf:type rdf:Property ;             rdfs:label "contains"@en ;             rdfs:comment "A property indicating which items a warehouse contains." ;             rdfs:domain inv:Warehouse ;             rdfs:range inv:InventoryItem .inv:warehouseID rdf:type rdf:Property ;                rdfs:label "warehouse ID"@en ;                rdfs:comment "The unique identifier of a warehouse." ;                rdfs:domain inv:Warehouse ;                rdfs:range xsd:string .
